title: Amsterdam, Virginia
text:
Amsterdam is an <a href="Unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Botetourt%20County%2C%20Virginia">Botetourt County</a>, <a href="Virginia">Virginia</a>, United States.
In an 1855 <a href="gazetteer">gazetteer</a>, it was listed as "a post-village" (<a href="stagecoach">stagecoach</a> stop) that contained "1 brick church and several tradesmen's shops."
